meta.title: Digg - What the Internet is talking about right now

div.div: HUMAN ERROR

div.a: Why Your GPS Isn't To Blame For Getting You Lost

div.div: The turn-by-turn instructions of GPS-based navigation systems, ingeniously designed though they may be, can’t always save us from ourselves.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/OCtrlv&via=Digg&text=Why Your GPS Isn't To Blame For Getting You Lost

div.div: AT LAST
With public excitement about White House beer fermenting such a buzz, we decided we better hop right to it.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/T3UGcT&via=Digg&text=White House Beer Recipe Revealed

div.div: THINGS THAT ONLY WORK FOR ASTRONAUTS

div.a: What The Apollo Astronauts Did For Life Insurance

div.div: Life insurance for a few guys flying to the moon turns out to be prohibitively expensive. This is what they did instead.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/OLfPVi&via=Digg&text=What The Apollo Astronauts Did For Life Insurance

div.div: THEFT

div.a: How Tracking Down My Stolen Computer Triggered A Drug Bust

div.div: "This is a true story. The names have been changed because, well, a guy ended up getting charged with a felony, something he’s probably not thrilled about. Call me cautious."

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/PGW6cE&via=Digg&text=How Tracking Down My Stolen Computer Triggered A Drug Bust

div.div: INFOGRAPHIC
It’s pretty interesting to see how fast code–the entire backbone of every website in existence–has evolved so much, so quickly through only the last 12 years.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/OBr9Vm&via=Digg&text=The Evolution Of Programming

div.div: WARNING SIGNS

div.a: New Jersey Grocery Store Shooter Tweeted About Killing Co-Workers

div.div: Unhappy with his life as a Marine stationed in California, Terence Tyler posed a question three years ago on Twitter: "is it normal to want to kill ALL of ur coworkers?"

li.div: If you end up a mass murderer, three year old tweets will be held against you. bigstory.ap.org/article/ex-mar...

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/T2Ydbm&via=Digg&text=New Jersey Grocery Store Shooter Tweeted About Killing Co-Workers

div.div: TASTES JUST LIKE CHICKEN

div.a: Twitter Co-Founders Create Fake Meat With Real Protein

div.div: Beyond Meat is adding the perfect texture to fake chicken and its tastes so much like the real thing you wouldn’t even know the difference.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/OF81G2&via=Digg&text=Twitter Co-Founders Create Fake Meat With Real Protein

div.div: BE FREE
A simple Chrome extension lets you take a break and pause your incoming Gmail.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/PGwaxX&via=Digg&text=How To Pause Your Email

div.div: NOT JUST FOR CRAM SESSIONS

div.a: Energy Drinks Improve Your Heart's Performance

div.div: A new study shows that energy drinks actually improve certain heart functions.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/QaUE04&via=Digg&text=Energy Drinks Improve Your Heart's Performance

div.div: SCIENTOLOGY

div.a: The Secret Wife-Auditioning Process Before Tom Cruise Married Katie Holmes

div.div: In 2004 Scientology embarked on a top-secret project which involved finding a girlfriend for Tom Cruise.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/NE06KR&via=Digg&text=The Secret Wife-Auditioning Process Before Tom Cruise Married Katie Holmes

div.div: HOPEFULLY NOT
It may be possible to mold someone into a psychopath.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/R697H6&via=Digg&text=Can You Make A Sociopath?

div.div: DOPING
I was Lance’s personal assistant for two years, during the height of his racing career. Do I think he cheated? Yep.

li.div: mindblowingly sad article written by lance armstrong's former personal assistant about his time with the cyclist: outsideonline.com/template...

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/OCtR9K&via=Digg&text=My Life With Lance Armstrong

div.div: INFOGRAPHIC

div.a: Why You Should Be Terrified Of A Free Trade Agreement You've Never Heard Of

div.div: Can a Free Trade Agreement really threaten Internet freedom, redefine copyright and alter the course of global healthcare? You bet.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/S2sBn4&via=Digg&text=Why You Should Be Terrified Of A Free Trade Agreement You've Never Heard Of

div.div: SAD

div.a: Mother Sets Herself On Fire After Failing Driving Test Four Times

div.div: A mother who was left distraught after she failed her driving test for the fourth time endangered others when she tried to commit suicide by setting fire to herself.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/ONVPRV&via=Digg&text=Mother Sets Herself On Fire After Failing Driving Test Four Times

div.div: SHOES ON FIRE

div.a: Paul Ryan Lied About His Marathon Time

div.div: He was off by, oh, an hour or so.

li.div: Don't Mess with Runner's World. (Via @nealcarruth) news.runnersworld.com/2012/08/...

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/T2OWP3&via=Digg&text=Paul Ryan Lied About His Marathon Time

div.div: THIS AGAIN
Wired.com refuses to publish full investigation into Jonah Lehrer's misdeeds that reveals evidence of plagiarism, dodgy quotes, and factual inaccuracies.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/NCbI13&via=Digg&text=Wired.com's Big Problem

div.div: APPLE

div.a: Will The New iPhone Come With Redesigned Headphones?

div.div: Vietnamese site Tinhte, which has a good record of procuring pre-release Apple products, has what they purport to be the headphones that will come with the new iPhone next month.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Qbo1iU&via=Digg&text=Will The New iPhone Come With Redesigned Headphones?

div.div: CHILLING LONGREADS

div.a: Pawns In The War On Drugs

div.div: Police enlist young offenders as confidential informants. But the work is high-risk, largely unregulated, and sometimes fatal.

li.div: A shocking read on the young offenders used as free undercover agents by cops, killed trying to wipe minor charges. newyorker.com/reporting/20...

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/OI9SIB&via=Digg&text=Pawns In The War On Drugs

div.div: PIRACY

div.a: Pirate Bay Founder Arrested In Cambodia

div.div: Pirate Bay founder Gottfrid Svartholm has been arrested in the Cambodian capital Phnom Penh.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/OPpF8B&via=Digg&text=Pirate Bay Founder Arrested In Cambodia

div.div: HISTORY

div.a: A History Of New York In 50 Objects

div.div: The New York Times recruited historians and museum curators to identify 50 objects that could embody the narrative of New York.

li.div: Brilliant from the NYTimes: A History of New York in 50 Objects nytimes.com/interactive/20...

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/PVKw9A&via=Digg&text=A History Of New York In 50 Objects

div.div: IN A MYSTICAL GLASS PALACE NO LESS

div.a: Steve Jobs Reincarnated As Warrior-Philosopher, Says Buddhist Group

div.div: Mr. Jobs has been reincarnated as a celestial warrior-philosopher, the Dhammakaya group said in a special television broadcast, and he’s living in a mystical glass palace hovering above his old office at Apple’s Cupertino, California headquarters.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/PScmGc&via=Digg&text=Steve Jobs Reincarnated As Warrior-Philosopher, Says Buddhist Group

div.div: PRIVACY
Why you should support Twitter's rage against the machine.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/S5sXJB&via=Digg&text=We Need Legally Protected Tweets

div.div: A LITTLE LATE, NO?

div.a: Al Gore Calls For End Of Electoral College

div.div: Many Americans are disenfranchised and some states are ignored because of the Electoral College, and it's time to abandon it, former Vice President Al Gore said on Thursday night.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SXR505&via=Digg&text=Al Gore Calls For End Of Electoral College

div.div: NEXT: POKE SPAM

div.a: Facebook Reveals The Sleazy Business Of Fake 'Likes'

div.div: Facebook says it is removing fraudulently generated “likes,” which helped make some businesses on Facebook appear more popular than they really were.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/QKquCQ&via=Digg&text=Facebook Reveals The Sleazy Business Of Fake 'Likes'
